Room.Name: The Widow Maker - Crew's Quarters
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the large crew quarters of the pirate ship Widow Maker.
Room.LongDescription: The large crew quarters provides sleeping accomodations for nearly four dozen pirates, who probably don't much care for your invasion of their privacy. The large crew quarters expands to the north, taking up most of the port side of the ship. Rows of cots lie on each side of the room.
